compliant.section: 4.1  This typically includes, but is not limited to: your device's IP address, your computer or mobile device operating system and browser type, the type of mobile device, the characteristics of the mobile device, the unique device identifier (UDID) or mobile equipment identifier (MEID) of the mobile device, the address of the referring website (if any), and the pages you visit on our platform or mobile application and the time of your visit. We may also use cookies (which you can disable through your browser preferences) to help the platform remember your previous visits. When you log in, this information will be associated with your personal account. This information will also be included in anonymous statistics to help us understand how visitors use our platform.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, purpose limitation, data minimisation, storage limitation, transparency, information, access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, right to object, automated individual decision-making and profiling, accountability

non_compliant.section: 4.2  Our mobile applications may use technologies such as GPS, Wi-Fi to collect precise information about your mobile device location. We may collect, use, disclose and/or process this information for one or more "purposes", including but not limited to: location-based services you request, delivering relevant content to you based on your location, allowing you to share your location with other users through services included in our mobile applications. You can revoke our permission to access your location information through the device settings of most mobile devices. If you have any questions about how to disable location services on your mobile device, please contact your mobile device service provider or device manufacturer.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, purpose limitation, data minimisation, storage limitation, transparency, information, access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, right to object, automated individual decision-making and profiling, accountability
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the specific legal basis for processing location data, such as consent or legitimate interest. It should also provide clear and concise information about the purpose of processing, the types of data collected, the recipients of the data, and the data retention period. The policy should also include information about the user's right to object to the processing of their location data.

non_compliant.section: 4.3  Because you browse pages on our website or mobile application, when you view content, advertising and access other software through our platform or service, such information may also be transmitted to us (including but not limited to IP address, operating system, etc.), but your device will send us information about the content, advertising and/or software installed on this service and platform that you view and the time, not the pages you view.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, purpose limitation, data minimisation, storage limitation, transparency, information, access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, right to object, automated individual decision-making and profiling, accountability
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide more specific information about the types of data collected, the purpose of processing, and the data retention period. It should also include information about the user's right to object to the processing of their data.
